name: Monobloc Construction
desc:
This ship has been built using the latest proprietary techniques in systems integration, boosting EMP resistance by %s percent, and reducing overload time by %s percent. Interference from the high-output engines cuts into weapon range by %s percent above %s/%s/%s/%s units, depending on hull size.

Incompatible with Heavy Armor, which cannot be bonded to DME standard ceramic laminate.
short: Improves EMP resistance, dissipation speed, and vent speed, reduces overload duration and weapon range above 600/700/800/900 units. Blocks Resistant Flux Conduits.

name: Skipspace Reaction Furnace
desc:
This advanced ship has an integral skipspace reaction furnace, boosting EMP resistance by %s percent, increasing the flux vent rate by %s percent, and siphoning off excess energy bleed, resulting in a sensor profile reduction of %s percent.

Incompatible with Resistant Flux Conduits, and, because the reactor is so volatile and tightly integrated, it precludes the use of Safety Overrides.
short: Improves EMP resistance, vent speed, and sensor stealth. Blocks Safety Overrides and Resistant Flux Conduits. Engines take more damage in combat.

name: Refurbished Frame
desc: A thorough, if questionably legal, refurbishing process has improved the repair rate of this ship by %s percent, and further improved CR recovery by %s percent.
short: Improves repair rate and CR recovery.

name: Sixth Bureau Upgrades
desc: This ship has been painstakingly upgraded to the elite specifications of the Sixth Bureau, lowering the sensor profile by %s percent, increasing flux capacity and dissipation by %s percent and increasing supply use by %s percent.
short: Reduced sensor profile and increased OP.

name: HULLMOD CONFLICT
desc: %s, the hullmod you tried to install conflicts with this hull or another previously installed hullmod.
